(Austin beat the Rock?  Hey, if he can't beat Triple H there's no chance in 
hell he'll beat the Great One.  That last Wrestlemania Rock lost to Austin 
was just a fluke, the Rock probably had a cold or something)

Demon Wulf/Flesh Ripper/Dark Claw/The Protectobots/Shockwave:




Demon Wulf turned, launching off four fire balls out of his mouth with 
precise aim at the incoming missiles.  The EMP blasts hit, doing slight 
damage but the thick chest plating helped protect him.

"Brothers," he said into his commlink, "it is time we leave." just as he 
finished the sentence a few bolts of laser energy struck him in the back.  
More irritated than in pain he spun around on his heal, raising his sword and 
launching off a missile at Cinder as he made his way northward at a fast 
paced run.

---

Flesh Ripper ducked as his scanners told him of missiles, his hands reaching 
up and grabbing two spears.  He turned quickly, throwing both spears at the 
same time at the two energy-signature seeking missiles.  Because of throwing 
them he was in a strange position, and being that, the missile that hit him 
nearly toppled him over.  Regaining his balance, he formed a yellowish orb 
with the power of a grenade and threw it at Greven, running after Demon Wulf.

---

Dark Claw's double laser cannons swerved, firing off a single bolt each, 
intercepting a missile from the Maximals and a missile from Killfest.  The 
other hit his armor but didn't penetrate into important systems.  The EMP 
blasts did absolutely nothing against his thick armor plating.  But a few 
more missiles and there would be no thick armor plating to protect him, and 
Dark Claw knew it.

Transforming to biped mode at Demon Wulf's order, the Vok warrior ran, 
turning slightly to form two black orbs of energy in both hands.  He threw 
one black orb at Killfest, the other at Mantle.  Both orbs having the power 
of a few charges.

---

Hot Spot transformed to biped mode just in time to see Demon Wulf make a run 
for it.  He slowly got up, jumping painfully up and grabbed onto Blades.

"Go up!  He isn't getting away!"

---

Groove watched the mess of the battle, and was still a little stunned at the 
landing of a ship.  He looked to Shockwave who attacked from behind while no 
one noticed him.

Taking out his photon pistol because he was to far away to use his 
vaporators, he fired off two bolts at the ancient robot's chest.

---

Blades made a sighing noise and gained altitude rapidly, arming his smart 
bombs.  "I you know how I feel about using the missiles.  Can I just grind 
him up in my blades?"

---

First Aid pushed himself to his feet slowly, raising his welding laser and 
firing off a small burst at Shockwave's abdomen.

---

Streetwise was approaching Demon Wulf rapidly.  The impact was quick and 
sweet.  For the first millisecond.  Upon impact Streetwise felt mass pain as 
Demon Wulf's body made an imprint in his grill and hood, and proceeded to 
roll and smash into his windshield and smash it right open.

Continuing despite the pain, Streetwise stopped suddenly, sending Demon Wulf 
flying out of the windshield and slamming to the ground.

Streetwise transformed to his biped mode with a few crunches of internal 
machinery adjusting to the structural damage.  When he was fully formed the 
windshield that made up most of his chest cracked badly as was most of his 
chest.  He staggered a moment, barely able to draw his photon pistol.

---

Shockwave felt a welding laser strike him as it penetrated into him.  He 
didn't let out a yell, but intoned instead.  "Fools."  Photon blasts struck 
his chest plating and slighty cut into it.  It was time to leave.  The 
Alliance Vok were leaving.  Raising the missile launcher he fired off  a 
rocket at Groove.  He began a run and leapt into the air, transforming into a 
space fighter.

Powering his engines to top speed he began to gain altitude rapidly and 
started to head in a northeastern direction.

He got a target lock and launched off two energy-signature seeking missiles 
down at EndBringer.
